text:
Excited to announce my new project idea: a multi-store e-commerce platform for everyone! Sellers can add products, and buyers can shop from multiple stores at once. 

Stay tuned for more updates!

cc: @FarzaTV @_buildspace @_nightsweekends https://t.co/xACHhGHKsI
